metadata.title: CVE-2022-28739 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
There is a buffer over-read in Ruby before 2.6.10, 2.7.x before 2.7.6, 3.xbefore 3.0.4, and 3.1.x before 3.1.2. It occurs in String-to-Floatconversion, including Kernel#Float and String#to_f.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-28739` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libruby3.0 - 3.0.2-7ubuntu2.1
ruby3.0 - 3.0.2-7ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby3.0 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.2-7ubuntu2.1').
